title: Game won't load after champion select Older Discussions havent fixed issue
body: Tried everything, please RIOT dont ignore this again. After Champion select the game does nothing, absolutely nothing shows up.

replies.body: yeah... game isn't loading after char select. just continues with background stuff (as if the game were not running) but I can hear all the sounds. then I get reported and slapped with some penalty from leaver buster. not fair, riot....

It's fine to reply to your previous thread, as it can provide better context for others trying to help you out.   As your issue persists, please contact our tech team for further assistance by submitting a [player support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Best of luck!
